page.title: 03Victorian Buildings:Splott
page.content: There are listed buildings built over 100 years ago for one reason but now perform different job. {The Maltings.}was a large factory in 1887 used for making malt from barley: stopped in the 1970's,the building became empty.Today the original 3 huge halls have been converted into small industrial units. {Eastmoors Hall.}was designed as a mission hall for the 'Forward Movement'.Between the two world wars it became known for its Magic Lantern shows.Now it houses the Splott Youth Centre. {St.Illtyds:}built in 1904 as a University Settlement started by Ruskin at Oxford Universit in 18th century.It's aim was to educate the poor.In 1924 it became the first catholic school in Wales.Today it houses small industrial units.
